jer.config.itemsPerColumn.title: Items Per Column
jer.config.itemsPerColumn.description: Changes the amount of items per column in the JEI dungeon and mob views
jer.config.itemsPerRow.title: Items Per Row
jer.config.itemsPerRow.description: Changes the amount of items per row in the JEI dungeon view
jer.config.enchantsBlacklist.title: Enchants Blacklist
jer.config.enchantsBlacklist.description: Blacklist enchants from the JEI Enchants View
jer.config.diyData.title: Use DIY data in the views
jer.config.diyData.description: The build in compat code will not load and jsons will be loaded (requires MC restart)
jer.config.dimensionsBlacklist.title: Dimension Blacklist
jer.config.dimensionsBlacklist.descripti: Blacklist dimensions from the JEI profiling scan
jer.config.showDevData.title: Show extra information
jer.config.showDevData.description: Mainly for pack devs. Features include but not limited to avg. blocks per chuck, entity ids, ...
jer.config.hiddenTabs.title: Hide tabs added by JER
_comment: # do not translate strings between quotes as they are used in code
jer.config.hiddenTabs.description: Tabs added by JER are 'dungeon', 'enchantment', 'mob', 'villager', worldgen' and 'plant'
